resources.string:
Hi, my name is Elyse. 

I just finished my Bachelor of Science in Information Technology specializing in software development with and emphasis on mobile. 

I am currently learning Kotlin and will be an Android Developer next fall. I am taking the Udacity Kotlin nanodegree. 

I love animals, miniature things, and lifting weights. 

I want to work for a company that makes a difference in the world and work on something I am passionate about. 

If you know of any Android Developer jobs, let me know!
